thread.section_title: The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient well managed property in midtown
thread.title_full: Convenient well managed property in midtown - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fred M
title: Convenient well managed property in midtown
text:
The Good:
Great location with friendly/helpful staff. Offered free bottled water and coffee at checking where I was promptly assigned a room and pointed on my way. - Please change nothing it should be this good all the time. As I recall Mr Smart helped me at the desk.
Once in my room was also very happy with the quality of the bed and decorations.
My only criticism would be that the rooms and bathrooms are a bit on the small side but would still return due to service and property quality
